body.name: Queen Bed Frame with 2-Tier Storage Headboard, Metal Platform Bed Frame with 4 Storage Drawers, Built in Charging Station & LED, Noise-Free/Metal Support/No Box Spring Needed, Vintage Brown

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Storage Headboard with Charging Station】The headboard is equipped with a built-in charging station, including 2 AC Outlets, a USB port and a type-C port, allowing you to charge various electronic devices within easy reach. 2-Tier Storage shelf on the headboard can provide more storage space, making it convenient for you to place commonly used items such as magazines, phones, alarm clocks, etc

【RGB LED Light Bed Frame】This Bed frame is equipped with RGB LED light belt, you can use the equipped remote control or mobile APP to set the LED color, brightness, mode, timing function, etc., to meet the needs of different styles and different scenes, make your home life more colorful. The LED function comes with detailed instructions, and you can follow the instructions to complete the corresponding settings.

【4 Sliding Fabric Storage Drawers】 4 sliding drawers of this bed frame are designed to make this bed more practical. These drawers not only can store seasonal clothes and other belongings. The drawer also comes with screw clips, which you can easily secure drawers to the bottom of the bed to prevent the drawer from slipping out.

【Noise-Free Design】In order to eliminate the squeak and ensure your sleep quality, we specially added a mute sponge bar to the middle beam to avoid the friction between the metal components. When you are sleeping or active in this bed, you are no longer disturbed by noise.

【Sturdy and Durable Structure】 The bed frame adopts an all-metal support system, which is sturdy and durable. We have replaced ordinary wooden slats with 11 metal rods, greatly improving load-bearing capacity, 9 metal bed legs increase the stability of the bed frame at the same time, so it can easily support up to 800lbs. This structure is designed to give you a great sense of security and a restful sleep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Lifezone queen bed frame features a storage headboard with charging-station & led light strip, 4 storage drawers, a Industrial style and all-metal support system.

Sparkle Point Drawers For Better Storage Four under-bed sliding drawers are all designed for better storage EVA Mute Sponge Reduce Noise The mute sponge on the center beam can avoid squeaking and let you sleep peacefully

Does the bed frame come with the installation tools & instructions? Of course, all you need to assemble is well-packaged and ship in one box. Please feel free to MESSAGE US if you have any problems after receiving the package: Login to Amazon account > Choose “Your Oder” > Find the Order ID > Click ”Contact Seller”. What is the recommended thickness of the mattress? Perfectly adapted to 8-10 inches mattresses. Does the mattress slide off the bed? No, the footboard of the bed frame is slightly higher than the platform part, which serves to hold the mattress in place to prevent it from sliding off. What is the specific dimension of the 4 under-bed storage drawers? The dimension data of the drawers are shown in one of the pictures provided on product detail page. Please check. Can the LED light strip of the bed frame be remotely controlled through a mobile app？ Of course, the LED strip can be remote controlled not only with the complimentary matching remote control, but also via APP. The QR code for APP download is on the instruction manual of the light strip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality bed frame with LED light
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoy the bed frame, it is good quality, took a while to assemble, turns out quite sturdy with such affordable price, the woody color also looks nice, LED light embedded underneath the headboard is a good plus, it can be controlled using app or a remote control. The charging port right inside the headboard includes a type-c charger, very convenient design. Four scrollable drawers also saved me a lot of space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent bed frame!
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was easy to put together. This bed frame is really nice when it’s all put together. The under bed storage is very handy if you don’t have a dresser. Highly recommend for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Setting it up was annoying, but the frame is MOSTLY of good quality! There were some parts of the frame where I was questioning the price compared to the quality, like the headboard “wood” is sort of flimsy. The metal is ok quality and sturdy though. My bed is an extra large and extremely heavy and I was worried it would mess with the base when I added my weight as well. It’s slightly squeaky & the metal on the base is kinda uneven though, so when someone lays on the bed, it kinda makes a metal clanging sound. The drawers are annoying to use and are a lot smaller than I expected. They aren’t actually attached to the bed and are held onto it with a screw and a hole. If you don’t position the screw correctly, you’re stuck fidgeting with the drawer for a bit, since once the bedding is on, it’s hard to see where the hole on the “wood” of the drawer is.Overall, it’s a decent bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame is sturdy and made from full metal (including cross beams). The package includes spare parts (wow!) and all of the parts needed to build the bed were included. There is foam strip included in the kit to limit the metal on metal squeaks - there are no squeaks from this bed frame. The package does weigh about 110lbs, so make sure you have a friend available to help you move it.Assembly took about 2 hours and the instructions were thorough. Assembly was easy with my only gripe being 4-5 screws that did not have pre-drilled holes in to the laminate wood. The only 2 screws that you MUST install are the ones to screw the outlet to the shelf on the headboard. Again, difficult but not terrible, which is why I gave ease of install a 4/5. The manufacturer could pre-drill the holes or at least put divots in to make installation of the screws easier.The below bed drawers are pretty cheap and do not ride on a track system (see picture). It will work for what I want to use it for but be warned. The drawers clip in to the bed frame to keep them flush with the bed. The top slide out drawers will be blocked by nightstands, if you have any.The LED strip is programmable and can light up in many different colors or has programmable modes, including one that reacts to sound.I hopefully won't need to buy another bed frame for a long time, but I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy bed… Short Head board and
reviews.reviewText: I love that the bed is Sturdy,easy to assemble, can carry a lot of weight. However I found that the headboard was short.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loved this bed!
reviews.reviewText: bought this as an early christmas gift for my 14 year old grandson, he loved it! He immediately emptied his bureau and filled the drawers with his clothes. he loved that he could charge his phone in the charging port in th ehead boards. Looks great.Wished the side of the headboard also had the wood veneer but otherwise looks great.Assembly takes a bit of time ( a few hours) so be prepared.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Quite sturdy. Easy to assemble, all parts were there and fit together perfectly. My grandson loves his new bed, especially the light strip and the convenient built in power strip that includes USB connections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Assembling was easy considering size(queen) and amount of pieces. The drawers are kind of cheap but, they work. The lights and outlet work good, very cute set up.
